title: Batman Begins
content:
I just came from seeing this movie.. Wasn't that bad I think. Anyone seen it? Best Batman stuff I've seen this far.
Movies like this make one (at least me) want to fight against injustice, at least in the cinema darkness, but when you get back to the street heading home you think "whatever" and ignore the thought. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Batman Begins
content: Yes, I saw this one a couple of months back - I agreed with the reviews though, they spent too much time in the beginning following his training.  It did have a few good laughs in it though, I thought it wasn't too bad overall.

title: Re: Batman Begins
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Yes, I saw this one a couple of months back - I agreed with the reviews though, they spent too much time in the beginning following his training. It did have a few good laughs in it though, I thought it wasn't too bad overall. [hr][/quote]

yeah, i didn't think it was that bad, but i have to agree with malvineous the training part of the movie was boring[url=http://www.dosvault.tk][img]http://venus.walagata.com/w/thedosvault/sig/tdv_banner.jpg[/img][/url]

WIPE OUT BUSH! WIPE OUT HOWARD!
